title: Login issue
description: User is unable to login with correct credentials.

title: Page not loading
description: Dashboard page takes too long to load.

title: UI alignment issue
description: Buttons are not aligned properly on mobile view.

title: Payment failed
description: Payment gets declined even with valid card.

title: Email notification not working
description: Users are not receiving email notifications.

title: Profile update error
description: Error occurs when updating profile information.

title: Search not returning results
description: Search feature shows empty results for valid keywords.

title: File upload failed
description: Users cannot upload files larger than 5MB.

title: Logout button not working
description: Clicking logout does not end the session.

title: Broken link
description: Help page link is redirecting to 404 page.

title: Slow API response
description: API response time is above 5 seconds.
